interfaces.presentation_model_interface module

Presentation Model Interface - Abstract Data Access Layer Defines the contract for presentation data operations

class interfaces.presentation_model_interface.IPresentationModelReader[源代码]

基类：ABC

Interface for read operations on presentation data

abstractmethod get_presentation_record(presentation_id)[源代码]

Retrieve presentation metadata by ID

返回类型:

Optional[PresentationMetadata]

abstractmethod get_slide_content(presentation_id)[源代码]

Get slide content for a presentation

返回类型:

List[SlideData]

abstractmethod get_template(template_id)[源代码]

Get template data and metadata

返回类型:

Tuple[Optional[Dict[str, Any]], Optional[TemplateMetadata]]

abstractmethod get_default_template()[源代码]

Get the default template

返回类型:

Tuple[Dict[str, Any], TemplateMetadata]

abstractmethod list_templates(category=None)[源代码]

List available templates

返回类型:

List[TemplateMetadata]
